Voyage of the Ancients.name: Voyage of the Ancients
Voyage of the Ancients.flavor: Using the cover of your assault, you vanish and leave a bewildered foe in your wake.
Voyage of the Ancients.trigger: You hit an enemy with a close or area attack
Voyage of the Ancients.effect: You teleport 3 squares. Choose a single enemy you hit with the attack. You and one ally you can see gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Wrath of the Destroyer.name: Wrath of the Destroyer
Wrath of the Destroyer.flavor: The destroyer aspect responds with deadly force to an attack, taking your battered enemy aback with your savagery.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: A bloodied enemy attacks you or your ally adjacent to you  Effect: You either make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy or charge it. If your attack hits, the enemy is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Pursuit of the Hunter.name: Pursuit of the Hunter
Pursuit of the Hunter.flavor: Your prey tries to maneuver away, but there is no escape.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you moves on its turn  Effect: You shift 3 squares. Until the end of your next turn, you deal 1d6 extra damage to the triggering enemy when you hit it, and you don’t take the –2 penalty to attack rolls for attacking it when it has cover or concealment.
